BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Health and the Subcommittee on Drug Abuse

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign the Internet System for Tracking Over-Prescribing Act (A.8320/S.5720A), legislation that would create an online database to report and track the prescription and dispensing of certain controlled substances.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Internet System for Tracking Over-Prescribing Act (A.8320/S.5720A)

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Health and the Subcommittee on Drug Abuse
